info.title: Management Plane Services
info.description: Management Plane manages service namespaces, applications, OpenAPI specs or Runtime specs, and keeps track of service instances. It serves as Namespace Registry, Application Registry, Configuration Repository, Service Registry combined.

tags.name: namespace
tags.description: namespace management functionality. Everything falls under namespace.

tags.name: application
tags.description: application management functionality. Service applications are organized directly under service namespaces. One service namespace can have 0, 1 or more service application.

tags.name: runtimeSpec
tags.description: runtime spec management functionality. An application can be defined and driven by runtime specification

tags.name: OpenAPISpec
tags.description: OpenAPI spe management functionality. An application can be defined and driven by OpenAPI specification

tags.name: instance
tags.description: instance management functionality. A service instance belongs to one certain application. One application can have 0, 1, or more instance.

409.description: Conflict: namespace with given id already exists
Conflict: namespace with given id does not exist

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: ID/name of namespace to be deleted

get.description: Find namespaces which match the criteria

parameters.name: fetch
parameters.description: the desired count of namespaces to return

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: the count of namespaces to skip to be returned
